originalArgs:
{"file":"/Users/fanzhang/Documents/server/rcc-tunnel.plist","instructions":"更新 LaunchAgent 配置文件，使用绝对路径和正确的配置","changes":[{"kind":"replace","lines":["<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd">
<plist version="1.0">
<dict>
    <key>Label</key>
    <string>com.user.rcc-tunnel</string>
    
    <key>ProgramArguments</key>
    <array>
        <string>/usr/bin/ssh</string>
        <string>-o</string>
        <string>ServerAliveInterval=60</string>
        <string>-o</string>
        <string>ServerAliveCountMax=3</string>
        <string>-o</string>
        <string>StrictHostKeyChecking=no</string>
        <string>-o</string>
        <string>UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null</string>
        <string>-N</string>
        <string>-R</string>
        <string>5520:localhost:5520</string>
        <string>root@154.26.213.15</string>
    </array>
    
    <key>StandardOutPath</key>
    <string>/Users/fanzhang/Documents/server/tunnel.log</string>
    
    <key>StandardErrorPath</key>
    <string>/Users/fanzhang/Documents/server/tunnel.error.log</string>
    
    <key>RunAtLoad</key>
    <true/>
    
    <key>KeepAlive</key>
    <dict>
        <key>SuccessfulExit</key>
        <false/>
        <key>Crashed</key>
        <true/>
    </dict>
</dict>
</plist>"]}]}
